con:request.name: Add Patient
con:request.con:request:
<Patient xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir"> <!-- 0..* An identifier for the person as this patient --> <identifier> <!-- 0..1 --> <use value="[usual | official | temp | secondary]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <label value="[string - Description of identifier (e.g., SSN)]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <system value="[uri - The namespace for the identifier]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <value value="[string - unique identifier (e.g., 123-45-6789)]"/> <!-- 0..1 Time period when id is/was valid for use --> <period> <!-- 0..1 --> <start value="[dateTime]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <end value="[dateTime]"/> </period> <!-- 0..1 Resource(Organization) Organization that issued id (may be just text) --> <assigner> <!-- 0..1 --> <reference value="[string - Relative, internal or absolute URL reference (to an Org resource)]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Text alternative for the resource (e.g., Org Name)]"/> </assigner> </identifier>
<!-- 0..* A name associated with the patient --> <name> <!-- 0..1 --> <use value="[usual | official | temp | nickname | anonymous | old | maiden]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <text value="[string - Text representation of the full name]"/> <!-- 0..* --> <family value="[string - Family name (often called 'Surname')]"/> <!-- 0..* --> <given value="[string - Given names (not always 'first'). Includes middle names]"/> <!-- 0..* --> <prefix value="[string - Parts that come before the name]"/> <!-- 0..* --> <suffix value="[string - Parts that come after the name]"/> <!-- 0..1 Time period when name was/is in use --> <period> <!-- 0..1 --> <start value="[dateTime]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <end value="[dateTime]"/> </period> </name>
<!-- 0..* A contact detail for the individual --> <telecom> <!-- 0..1 --> <system value="[phone | fax | email | url]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <value value="[string - the actual contact details]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <use value="[home | work | temp | old | mobile - purpose of this address]"/> <!-- 0..1 Time period when the contact was/is in use --> <period> <!-- 0..1 --> <start value="[dateTime]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <end value="[dateTime]"/> </period> </telecom>
<!-- 0..1 CodeableConcept Gender for administrative purposes --> <gender> <!-- 0..* Coding Code defined by a terminology system --> <coding> <!-- 0..1 --> <system value="[uri - Identity of the terminology system]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <version value="[string - Version of the system - if relevant]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <code value="[code - Symbol in syntax defined by the system]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Representation defined by the system]"/> <!-- 0..1 If this code was chosen directly by the user --> <primary value="[true | false]"/> <!-- 0..1 Resource(ValueSet) Set this coding was chosen from --> <valueSet> <!-- 0..1 --> <reference value="[string - Relative, internal or absolute URL reference]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Text alternative for the resource]"/> </valueSet> </coding> <!-- 0..1 --> <text value="[string - Plain text representation of the concept]"/> </gender>
<!-- 0..1 The date and time of birth for the individual --> <birthDate value="[dateTime]"/>
<!-- 0..1 Indicates if the individual is deceased or not --> <!-- Alternatively, can use deceasedDateTime with a dateTime value --> <deceasedBoolean value="[true | false]" />
<!-- 0..* Addresses for the individual --> <address> <!-- 0..1 - purpose of this address --> <use value="[home | work | temp | old]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <text value="[string - Text representation of the address]"/> <!-- 0..* --> <line value="[string - Street name, number, direction and PO Box etc.]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <city value="[string - Name of city, town etc.]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <state value="[string - Sub-unit of country (abbreviations ok)]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <zip value="[string - Postal code for area]"/> <!-- 0..1 Country (can be ISO 3166 3 letter code) --> <country value="[string]"/> <!-- 0..1 Period Time period when address was/is in use --> <period> <!-- 0..1 --> <start value="[dateTime]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <end value="[dateTime]"/> </period> </address>
<!-- 0..1 CodeableConcept Marital (civil) status of a person --> <maritalStatus> <coding> <!-- 0..1 --> <system value="[uri - Identity of the terminology system]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <version value="[string - Version of the system - if relevant]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <code value="[code - Symbol in syntax defined by the system]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Representation defined by the system]"/> <!-- 0..1 If this code was chosen directly by the user --> <primary value="[true | false]"/> <valueSet> <!-- 0..1 --> <reference value="[string - Relative, internal or absolute URL reference]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Text alternative for the resource]"/> </valueSet> </coding> </maritalStatus>
<!-- 0..1 boolean|integer Whether patient is part of a multiple birth --> <!-- Alternatively, can use multipleBirthInteger with a integer value for birth order --> <multipleBirthBoolean value="[true | false]"/>
<!-- 0..* Attachment Image of the person --> <photo> <!-- 1..1 --> <contentType value="[code - Mime type of the content, with charset etc.]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <language value="[code - Human language of the content (BCP-47)]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <data value="[base64Binary - Data inline, base64ed]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <url value="[uri - Uri where the data can be found]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <size value="[integer - Number of bytes of content (if url provided)]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <hash value="[base64Binary - Hash of the data (sha-1, base64ed )]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <title value="[string - Label to display in place of the data]"/> </photo>
<!-- 0..* A contact party (e.g. guardian, partner, friend) for the patient --> <contact> <!-- 0..* CodeableConcept The kind of relationship --> <relationship> <!-- 0..* Coding Code defined by a terminology system --> <coding> <!-- 0..1 --> <system value="[uri - Identity of the terminology system]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <version value="[string - Version of the system - if relevant]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <code value="[code - Symbol in syntax defined by the system]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Representation defined by the system]"/> <!-- 0..1 If this code was chosen directly by the user --> <primary value="[true | false]"/> <!-- 0..1 Resource(ValueSet) Set this coding was chosen from --> <valueSet> <!-- 0..1 --> <reference value="[string - Relative, internal or absolute URL reference]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Text alternative for the resource]"/> </valueSet> </coding> <!-- 0..1 --> <text value="[string - Plain text representation of the concept]"/> </relationship> <!-- 0..1 A name associated with the person --> <name> <!-- 0..1 --> <use value="[usual | official | temp | nickname | anonymous | old | maiden]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <text value="[string - Text representation of the full name]"/> <!-- 0..* --> <family value="[string - Family name (often called 'Surname')]"/> <!-- 0..* --> <given value="[string - Given names (not always 'first'). Includes middle names]"/> <!-- 0..* --> <prefix value="[string - Parts that come before the name]"/> <!-- 0..* --> <suffix value="[string - Parts that come after the name]"/> <!-- 0..1 Time period when name was/is in use --> <period> <!-- 0..1 --> <start value="[dateTime]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <end value="[dateTime]"/> </period> </name> <!-- 0..* A contact detail for the person --> <telecom> <!-- 0..1 --> <system value="[phone | fax | email | url]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <value value="[string - the actual contact details]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <use value="[home | work | temp | old | mobile - purpose of this address]"/> <!-- 0..1 Time period when the contact was/is in use --> <period> <!-- 0..1 --> <start value="[dateTime]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <end value="[dateTime]"/> </period> </telecom> <!-- 0..1 Address for the contact person --> <address> <!-- 0..1 home | work | temp | old - purpose of this address --> <use value="[code]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <text value="[string - Text representation of the address]"/> <!-- 0..* --> <line value="[string - Street name, number, direction and PO Box etc]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <city value="[string - Name of city, town etc.]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <state value="[string - Sub-unit of country (abbreviations ok)]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <zip value="[string - Postal code for area]"/> <!-- 0..1 Country (can be ISO 3166 3 letter code) --> <country value="[string]"/> <!-- 0..1 Period Time period when address was/is in use --> <period> <!-- 0..1 --> <start value="[dateTime]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <end value="[dateTime]"/> </period> </address> <!-- 0..1 CodeableConcept Gender for administrative purposes --> <gender> <!-- 0..* Coding Code defined by a terminology system --> <coding> <!-- 0..1 --> <system value="[uri - Identity of the terminology system]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <version value="[string - Version of the system - if relevant]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <code value="[code - Symbol in syntax defined by the system]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Representation defined by the system]"/> <!-- 0..1 If this code was chosen directly by the user --> <primary value="[true | false]"/> <!-- 0..1 Resource(ValueSet) Set this coding was chosen from --> <valueSet> <!-- 0..1 --> <reference value="[string - Relative, internal or absolute URL reference]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Text alternative for the resource]"/> </valueSet> </coding> <!-- 0..1 --> <text value="[string - Plain text representation of the concept]"/> </gender> <!-- ?? 0..1 Resource(Organization) Organization that is associated with the contact --> <organization> <!-- 0..1 --> <reference value="[string - Relative, internal or absolute URL reference]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Text alternative for the resource]"/> </organization> </contact>
<!-- 0..1 If this patient is an animal (non-human) --> <animal> <!-- 1..1 CodeableConcept E.g. Dog, Cow --> <species> <!-- 0..* Coding Code defined by a terminology system --> <coding> <!-- 0..1 --> <system value="[uri - Identity of the terminology system]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <version value="[string - Version of the system - if relevant]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <code value="[code - Symbol in syntax defined by the system]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Representation defined by the system]"/> <!-- 0..1 If this code was chosen directly by the user --> <primary value="[true | false]"/> <!-- 0..1 Resource(ValueSet) Set this coding was chosen from --> <valueSet> <!-- 0..1 --> <reference value="[string - Relative, internal or absolute URL reference]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Text alternative for the resource]"/> </valueSet> </coding> <!-- 0..1 --> <text value="[string - Plain text representation of the concept]"/> </species> <!-- 0..1 CodeableConcept E.g. Poodle, Angus --> <breed> <!-- 0..* Coding Code defined by a terminology system --> <coding> <!-- 0..1 --> <system value="[uri - Identity of the terminology system]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <version value="[string - Version of the system - if relevant]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <code value="[code - Symbol in syntax defined by the system]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Representation defined by the system]"/> <!-- 0..1 If this code was chosen directly by the user --> <primary value="[true | false]"/> <!-- 0..1 Resource(ValueSet) Set this coding was chosen from --> <valueSet> <!-- 0..1 --> <reference value="[string - Relative, internal or absolute URL reference]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Text alternative for the resource]"/> </valueSet> </coding> <!-- 0..1 --> <text value="[string - Plain text representation of the concept]"/> </breed> <!-- 0..1 CodeableConcept E.g. Neutered, Intact --> <genderStatus> <!-- 0..* Coding Code defined by a terminology system --> <coding> <!-- 0..1 --> <system value="[uri - Identity of the terminology system]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <version value="[string - Version of the system - if relevant]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <code value="[code - Symbol in syntax defined by the system]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Representation defined by the system]"/> <!-- 0..1 If this code was chosen directly by the user --> <primary value="[true | false]"/> <!-- 0..1 Resource(ValueSet) Set this coding was chosen from --> <valueSet> <!-- 0..1 --> <reference value="[string - Relative, internal or absolute URL reference]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Text alternative for the resource]"/> </valueSet> </coding> <!-- 0..1 --> <text value="[string - Plain text representation of the concept]"/> </genderStatus> </animal>
<!-- 0..* CodeableConcept Languages which may be used to communicate with the patient about his or her health --> <communication> <!-- 0..* Coding Code defined by a terminology system --> <coding> <!-- 0..1 --> <system value="[uri - Identity of the terminology system]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <version value="[string - Version of the system - if relevant]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <code value="[code - Symbol in syntax defined by the system]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Representation defined by the system]"/> <!-- 0..1 If this code was chosen directly by the user --> <primary value="[true | false]"/> <!-- 0..1 Resource(ValueSet) Set this coding was chosen from --> <valueSet> <!-- 0..1 --> <reference value="[string - Relative, internal or absolute URL reference]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Text alternative for the resource]"/> </valueSet> </coding> <!-- 0..1 --> <text value="[string - Plain text representation of the concept]"/> </communication>
<!-- 0..* Resource(Organization|Practitioner) Patient's nominated care provider --> <careProvider> <!-- 0..1 --> <reference value="[string - Relative, internal or absolute URL reference]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Text alternative for the resource]"/> </careProvider>
<!-- 0..1 Resource(Organization) Organization that is the custodian of the patient record --> <managingOrganization> <!-- 0..1 --> <reference value="[string - Relative, internal or absolute URL reference]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Text alternative for the resource]"/> </managingOrganization>
<!-- 0..* Link to another patient resource that concerns the same actual person --> <link> <!-- 1..1 Resource(Patient) The other patient resource that the link refers to --> <other> <!-- 0..1 --> <reference value="[string - Relative, internal or absolute URL reference]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Text alternative for the resource]"/> </other> <!-- 1..1 - type of link --> <type value="[replace | refer | seealso]"/> </link>
<!-- 0..1 Whether this patient's record is in active use --> <active value="[true | false]"/> </Patient>

<!-- 0..* A name associated with the patient --> <name> <!-- 0..1 --> <use value="[usual | official | temp | nickname | anonymous | old | maiden]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <text value="[string - Text representation of the full name]"/> <!-- 0..* --> <family value="[string - Family name (often called 'Surname')]"/> <!-- 0..* --> <given value="[string - Given names (not always 'first'). Includes middle names]"/> <!-- 0..* --> <prefix value="[string - Parts that come before the name]"/> <!-- 0..* --> <suffix value="[string - Parts that come after the name]"/> <!-- 0..1 Time period when name was/is in use --> <period> <!-- 0..1 --> <start value="[dateTime]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <end value="[dateTime]"/> </period> </name>
<!-- 0..* A contact detail for the individual --> <telecom> <!-- 0..1 --> <system value="[phone | fax | email | url]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <value value="[string - the actual contact details]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <use value="[home | work | temp | old | mobile - purpose of this address]"/> <!-- 0..1 Time period when the contact was/is in use --> <period> <!-- 0..1 --> <start value="[dateTime]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <end value="[dateTime]"/> </period> </telecom>
<!-- 0..1 CodeableConcept Gender for administrative purposes --> <gender> <!-- 0..* Coding Code defined by a terminology system --> <coding> <!-- 0..1 --> <system value="[uri - Identity of the terminology system]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <version value="[string - Version of the system - if relevant]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <code value="[code - Symbol in syntax defined by the system]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Representation defined by the system]"/> <!-- 0..1 If this code was chosen directly by the user --> <primary value="[true | false]"/> <!-- 0..1 Resource(ValueSet) Set this coding was chosen from --> <valueSet> <!-- 0..1 --> <reference value="[string - Relative, internal or absolute URL reference]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Text alternative for the resource]"/> </valueSet> </coding> <!-- 0..1 --> <text value="[string - Plain text representation of the concept]"/> </gender>
<!-- 0..1 The date and time of birth for the individual --> <birthDate value="[dateTime]"/>
<!-- 0..1 Indicates if the individual is deceased or not --> <!-- Alternatively, can use deceasedDateTime with a dateTime value --> <deceasedBoolean value="[true | false]" />
<!-- 0..* Addresses for the individual --> <address> <!-- 0..1 - purpose of this address --> <use value="[home | work | temp | old]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <text value="[string - Text representation of the address]"/> <!-- 0..* --> <line value="[string - Street name, number, direction and PO Box etc.]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <city value="[string - Name of city, town etc.]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <state value="[string - Sub-unit of country (abbreviations ok)]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <zip value="[string - Postal code for area]"/> <!-- 0..1 Country (can be ISO 3166 3 letter code) --> <country value="[string]"/> <!-- 0..1 Period Time period when address was/is in use --> <period> <!-- 0..1 --> <start value="[dateTime]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <end value="[dateTime]"/> </period> </address>
<!-- 0..1 CodeableConcept Marital (civil) status of a person --> <maritalStatus> <coding> <!-- 0..1 --> <system value="[uri - Identity of the terminology system]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <version value="[string - Version of the system - if relevant]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <code value="[code - Symbol in syntax defined by the system]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Representation defined by the system]"/> <!-- 0..1 If this code was chosen directly by the user --> <primary value="[true | false]"/> <valueSet> <!-- 0..1 --> <reference value="[string - Relative, internal or absolute URL reference]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Text alternative for the resource]"/> </valueSet> </coding> </maritalStatus>
<!-- 0..1 boolean|integer Whether patient is part of a multiple birth --> <!-- Alternatively, can use multipleBirthInteger with a integer value for birth order --> <multipleBirthBoolean value="[true | false]"/>
<!-- 0..* Attachment Image of the person --> <photo> <!-- 1..1 --> <contentType value="[code - Mime type of the content, with charset etc.]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <language value="[code - Human language of the content (BCP-47)]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <data value="[base64Binary - Data inline, base64ed]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <url value="[uri - Uri where the data can be found]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <size value="[integer - Number of bytes of content (if url provided)]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <hash value="[base64Binary - Hash of the data (sha-1, base64ed )]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <title value="[string - Label to display in place of the data]"/> </photo>

<!-- 1..* Resource(Practitioner|Device|Patient|RelatedPerson) Who and/or what authored the document --> <author> <!-- 0..1 Relative, internal or absolute URL reference --> <reference value="[string]"/> <!-- 0..1 Text alternative for the resource --> <display value="[string]"/> </author>

<!-- 0..1 Resource(Practitioner|Organization) Who/What authenticated the document --> <authenticator> <!-- 0..1 Relative, internal or absolute URL reference --> <reference value="[string]"/> <!-- 0..1 Text alternative for the resource --> <display value="[string]"/> </authenticator>
<!-- 0..1 Document creation time --> <created value="[dateTime]"/>
<!-- 1..1 When this document reference created --> <indexed value="[instant]"/>
<!-- 1..1 current | superceded | entered in error --> <status value="[code]"/>
<!-- 0..1 CodeableConcept preliminary | final | appended | amended | entered in error --> <docStatus> <!-- 0..* Coding Code defined by a terminology system --> <coding> <!-- 0..1 --> <system value="[uri - Identity of the terminology system]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <version value="[string - Version of the system - if relevant]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <code value="[code - Symbol in syntax defined by the system]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Representation defined by the system]"/> <!-- 0..1 If this code was chosen directly by the user --> <primary value="[true | false]"/> <!-- 0..1 Resource(ValueSet) Set this coding was chosen from --> <valueSet> <!-- 0..1 --> <reference value="[string - Relative, internal or absolute URL reference]"/> <!-- 0..1 --> <display value="[string - Text alternative for the resource]"/> </valueSet> </coding> <!-- 0..1 --> <text value="[string - Plain text representation of the concept]"/> </docStatus>
